Row.Text: JakeWalrusWhale's Republic of the Rio Grande
Win as the Republic of the Rio Grande.
As Rio Grande, last longer than Rio Grande did in real life.
Achievements for mods created by JakeWalrusWhale
Establish a Newspaper for Rio Grande

War has been declared, and you and your people want a way to get the news from the front. A newspaper would be a great solution, and it would help the people worried back home. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Rio Grande [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be at War [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have the "Military Science" Technology [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]300 [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All current Units Get 15 Experience. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]You get 15 Happiness.

The new newspaper was titled the "Correo del Rio Bravo del Norte". People everywhere in your empire are reading the news! [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All current Units Get 15 Experience. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]You get 15 Happiness.
Gather Volunteers for the Rio Grande Army

It seems that you may have a war to deal with, but you lack an army. Luckily, soldiers from another friendly nation are willing to fight on your side. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Rio Grande [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a Declaration of Friendship with another Player [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be in the Renaissance Era or later [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]500 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Each unit owned by a civilization that you have a Declaration of Friendship with will have a 10% chance to join your side.

Friendly Soldiers have joined your side, and are ready to fight for you! [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Each unit owned by a civilization that you have a Declaration of Friendship with will have a 10% chance to join your side.
Our people are now federalists and rebelling against the Mexican government. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
We are glad to see that your people are federalists and rebelling against the Mexican government. The amazing works of our civilization are truly inspiring!
